thread.section_title: Hotel Vernet - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Good Stay
thread.title_full: Good Stay - Review of Hotel Vernet, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Chotik C
title: Good Stay
text: The hotel is nicely located. We had great time staying at the hotel. Check in procedure was quite friendly and the service from the Front Desk, Concierge, restaurant staff, and bell haven been satisfactory. There was no coffee maker or even Tea selection in the room. This is very standard in Europe and I would expect all the room at Hotel Vernet to be equipped with such amenities. Being a starwood preferred Gold Guest, I was not offered room upgrade though.
